items.headline: PepsiCo cut prices on Doritos, Cheetos after customer complaints about affordability
items.summary_en: PepsiCo’s stock was set to pull back, despite an earnings beat and a raised dividend.

items.headline: Pfizer study finds patients lose up to 12% of their weight after taking once-a-month drug
items.summary_en: Pfizer on Tuesday hailed a study of a weight-loss-drug candidate while forecasting a profit decline due to the impact of the Trump administration’s policies on pricing and tariffs.

items.headline: ‘I’m rich in everything but parents’: I inherited $400K. Is it unwise to use this money to buy a house with my fiancé?
